usage.cn: 其实，那天我想说的是，“我们永远不要分开了好不好？”
usage.eng: Actually I wanted to say on that day,"Shall we never get apart,OK?"

usage.cn: 在有生的瞬间能遇到你，竟花光所有运气。〔林夕〕
usage.eng: It actually took all my luck to meet you for just a moment in my lifetime.

usage.cn: 你是不是总是会为了某人而不断地修改自己的底线？不停地为某人找借口，不停地想去原谅……可是，傻女孩，其实他没那么喜欢你。
usage.eng: Girls are always changing their limits for somebody.Finding excuses and forgiving...Actually he has his limit to love you.

usage.cn: 电视上演的与真实生活大相径庭（电子游戏同样如此）。实际上，现实生活中，人们不得不离开咖啡店，回去为生计奔波。
usage.eng: Television is NOT real life （nor are video games）。 In real life people actually have to leave the coffee shop and go to jobs.
